attributes.additional_details: I propose that those in power seriously look at the detrimental effect Nicklas Bendtner is having on British Football With a few to deporting him. He is single handidly destroying the game and everything it stands for and this started when he wore pink boots. He is now making the people and fans of Sunderland Associtation Football Club suffer, offering them no hope and precious little to look forward too. Act now, before it is too late.
